section.title: Enter only if you know what you are doing!
section.p:
All information concerning the development and beta testing Pingus is at a separate section on this webpage (which currently out of order), so that players don't accidentally stuff that wasn't yet meant for release or grab a snapshot, instead of a stable binary by accident. So if you are player don't enter this section, but instead stay on the site of the Pingus webpage and simply wait for the next release which will contain everything in a nice packaged useable form, going to the development section will just spoil a lot.
If you are or want to become a developer you are of course to the dark site of Pingus, there you will find source documentation, a todo with stuff that needs to be done unfinished game elements that might need you to finish them.
